body_content.explanation: the act of paying or promising to pay someone an amount of money if they suffer damage or loss:
examples: They asked for some form of indemnification in case the proposed deal was blocked.
The government has allocated large sums for the indemnification of farmers whose crops are destroyed.

body_content.explanation: the act of protecting someone against legal responsibility for their actions:
examples: All of our employees receive indemnification against legal action.
Before I will say anything, I want full indemnification.
